summary: This mod adds a new follower Birash into Solstheim's Jail. It also adds a titan called Boulgorge. Both can be recruited and both are Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml: This mod adds a new follower Birash into Solstheim's Jail. It also adds a titan called Boulgorge. Both can be recruited and both are Dragonborn. Birash has a few lines about himself stating how he entered jail, and how he is awaitng for someone to bring him to his destiny. Please tell me what you guys think. I'm trying to push my CK Skills and I want to know what you guys think.
author: GBTKOJ
